title: Thank you Matt
content: Hello Matt, this is Ilio Pieroni thanking you for explaining that my problem was caused by VPN doing a very good job in masking me out of existence, and being blacklisted. The moment I turned it off, every worked again. I contacted bitdefender, including your response. Waiting for a replay. Thank you again Matt, much appreciated. Regards Ilio Pieroni
creator: Iliopier

title: Thunderbird just updated and most of my e-mails became unreadable
content:
This is what most of my received e-mail messages now look like:

<td align=3D"left" bgcolor=3D"#ED3B30">

Some e-mails can still be read but the message is from a previously deleted e-mail and is not what the current e-mail is about. (A message from a previous e-mail has been inserted into the body of the new e-mail and the info. in the new e-mail has vanished.)

Can someone help me? Thank you.
creator: cahwhite

title: Enable Calendars in TB 115.10.1
content:
I have nine calendars on my TB calendar page.

Some weeks ago, seven of them stopped displaying. They each have a gray Enable button next to their name in the Calendars list, but it doesn't do anything.

How can I reenable these calendars?

(14 other people have a similar problem in the post Enable Calendars in TB V.115.8.0 but it has been archived.)
creator: Toolworker
